exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros p m H. induction p. - intro H'. inversion H'. - simpl. destruct p. + intros. apply divides_1. + assert (H'' : 2 <> 0). lia. apply divides_mult. * apply IHp. lia. * apply fact_le. apply le_plus_trans. apply IHp. lia. * apply div_fact_le. lia. * apply nat.add_le_mono; lia. - apply Nat.le_lt_trans with (fact m). + apply fact_le. apply IHp. lia. + simpl. apply lt_n_Sm_le. apply H.
